facts.text: The kit manufacturer for the team from 2009 to 2018 was Adidas.
The shirt sponsor for the team in 2023 is Providence.
Travian Sousa wears the number 3 and plays as a defender (DF) for the team.
Jordan Morris is identified as a Homegrown Player (HGP) and a Designated Player (DP) for the team.
Sigi Schmid served as the team's head coach from December 16, 2008, to July 26, 2016.
Brian Schmetzer became the head coach on a permanent basis on November 2, 2016, and has held the position since.
The team has won the MLS Cup twice, in 2016 and 2019.
The team won the CONCACAF Champions League in 2022.
Stefan Frei, the team's goalkeeper, is also the team captain as of the latest update.
Garth Lagerwey served as the General Manager and Chief Soccer Officer from 2015 to 2022.
The team has won the U.S. Open Cup four times: in 2009, 2010, 2011, and 2014.
The team's majority owner is Adrian Hanauer, representing Hanauer Futb√≥l LLC.
Celebrities Russell Wilson, Ciara, and Macklemore are listed as minority owners of the team.
